body:
Basically what the title says. It says I need "250 Rep" to create a guild. 
Everyone always says that internet points don't matter. But clearly, they always matter right?
body_html: Basically what the title says. It says I need "250 Rep" to create a guild. Everyone always says that internet points don't matter. But clearly, they always matter right?
title: Will I never be able to create a guild, if I don't write politically approved talking points?

body:
Yeah. Typically if you disagree with somebody and phrase it in a way that keeps a good discussion going you'll still get upvoted. There are also some non-political Guilds like +gaming where there is heavy activity.

I can't speak on behalf of Ruqqus but I like that positive rep is required. It prevents some random person from coming in and creating some crazy Guild to make the entire community look bad.
body_html:
Yeah. Typically if you disagree with somebody and phrase it in a way that keeps a good discussion going you'll still get upvoted. There are also some non-political Guilds like +gaming where there is heavy activity.
